title: Soldier of Fortune II: Double Helix Demo
description:
You are John Mullins, a professional consultant with a long combat record and a reputation for getting the job done when the worldâs governments canât. After a long and distinguished career in the Armyâs Special Forces, youâre now in business for yourself, taking most of your contracts from a secret organization known only as The Shop. Together with your old friend Sam Gladstone and your partner, Madeline Taylor, you combat terrorism around the globe.

Youâve learned that a bloodthirsty worldwide terrorist organization has developed a deadly genetic virus and is threatening to unleash it on the world unless their demands are met. Your mission: root out the terrorist organization, uncover their secret plans, put a stop to their operation and bring their leader to justice.

Failure is not an option.
subject: Windows games; Vintage computer games; Action games
creator: Raven Software
